Title: Enacts the Customer Savings and Reliability Act; and repeals certain provisions of the public service law relating to gas service and sale
Summary: Enacts the "Customer Savings and Reliability Act" in relation to regional affordable gas transition plans to guide an orderly, affordable, and equitable right-sizing of the utility gas system in a manner that aligns with climate justice and emissions reduction provisions.
LawCode: Add §§66-x & 66-y, amd §§4, 5, 30 & 31, Pub Serv L; amd §12, add §13, Transp Corps L; amd §224-d, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, the transportation corporations law and the labor law, in relation to enacting the "Customer Savings and Reliability Act"
